actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Constrict: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14+1d4 + 12). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.
